import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{ImgBanner}from'./styles';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Banner=()=>{const[catalogoServico,setCatalogoServico]=useState(null);const{id}=useParams();// Efeito para buscar os dados do restaurante específico ao carregar o componente
